resources.string: How can I add an Account?
How can I access my Payment History?
How can I add a Card?
To add an account, navigate to finance section and click on the add account button. Then select your bank and verify your mobile number to get going.
Navigate to Payments section. You will find your payment history under the History tab.
To make a transfer, navigate to Payments section.Under the Send tab, from there you can choose the type of transfer, add the amount and submit.
Navigate to Finance section. Click on Add Card under the Cards tab.
